attributes.action: Provide police officers with personal med kits
attributes.additional_details: In situations like the recent attack on london i believe something as simple as a personal med kit similar to those carried by the armed forces could have the potential to help save lives until proper medical services can be provided.
attributes.background: I believe providing police with personal fire arms to be wrong and not in line with british culture, however providing police with a personal med kit similar to the armed forces will potentially reduce the risk of death due to medical aid being given immediatly while medical services arrive.
